name: Kybalion
description:
Thoth, the Egyptian god mantainer of the universe and keeper of knowledge, has chosen you to face light and darkness in order to obtain a sacred relic known as the Heart of the Sky.

Will you be able to live up to his expectations transformed into a  raven?

Commands:

Spacebar - Take Off
W - Fly forward
Mouse (horizontal) - Yaw

Demo created for the Epic MegaJam 2022
